extendedInfo.description: You are king of the ANTS - feeding, squishing, burning, marching, exploding, fighting, moving, and racing your ants!Should the ants live in peaceful coexistence or battle to the death? Burn them with a magnifying glass or make them race for food? With Pocket Ants the choice is yours.Game Features:â¢ Electrocute and drown the ants with the storm!â¢ Collect and move the ants with the ant magnet.â¢ Feed the ants strawberries and watermelon.â¢ Burn the ants with the magnifying glass!â¢ Have the ants move their home.â¢ Blow up the ants with ant mines.â¢ Drop rocks on ants.â¢ Draw a path for the ants to follow.â¢ Race the ants.â¢ Add more or less ants.â¢ Set red and black ant aggressiveness.â¢ Set percentage of black/red ants.â¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device.

reviews.title: Great passtime.
reviews.comment: I like all the cool crap u can do to the ants and the animations are great. However, for the paths u should be able to choose what color ant uses what path and for the laser u should have an option of how long they stay on. Just a suggestion.
